main event: Residents in San Jose, California, reported hearing a sonic boom attributed to a possible unidentified flying object or military aircraft on February 15, 1960.
interesting points: A sonic boom was heard traveling along a path from Altamont to San Jose,The report indicated that sounds experienced by residents may be attributed to sonic booms and the unique geographical configuration of the area,The document contains comments suggesting that the object might have been misidentified as a military aircraft,Several residents claimed to have witnessed a 'jet-like object' hovering in the East Foothills,There was mention of a previous sighting in 1955 of an object that was bright and hovering.
